detail_desc: Jumper in a soft, fine-knit merino wool blend with a V-neck, long sleeves and striped ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Fine-knit socks in a soft cotton blend with elasticated tops.
A pair of large hoop earrings in textured metal. Diameter 7 cm. The zinc content of the earrings is recycled.
Long skirt in airy chiffon with a high, elasticated waist and high slits in the sides. Short jersey underskirt.
Cardigan in fine-knit organic cotton with moss-knit stripes, buttons down the front and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Boxer shorts in cotton jersey with short legs, an elasticated waist and lined front.
Blouse in airy crêpe with a small stand-up collar, gathers at the back of the neck, buttons down the front and long raglan sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Rounded and longer at the back.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a mid waist, knot detail at the sides and cutaway coverage at the back.
Shorts in a cotton weave with an adjustable, elasticated waist, fly with a press-stud, side pockets and fake welt back pockets.
Knee-length lace dress with a V-neck and short cap sleeves. Seam at the waist, flared skirt and a concealed zip at the back.
Long-sleeved top in soft cotton jersey with a press-stud on one shoulder (except in sizes 1½-4Y) and a narrow ribbed trim around the neckline.
Top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Fitted jacket in washed, stretch denim with buttons down the front, flap chest pockets with a button, and side pockets.
Top in printed sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined, drawstring hood with a wrapover front. Long sleeves, a kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Straight T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with an interactive motif on the front. Round neck with narrow ribbing around the neckline.
Calf-length joggers in sturdy jersey made from a viscose blend with a high, elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and gently tapered legs with sewn-in creases at the front.
Jacket in sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined, drawstring hood. Zip down the front, side pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Jumper in fine-knit slub cotton with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and roll edges around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Short, A-line skirt with buttons down the front.
Metal hoop earrings in various sizes. Length from 2 cm to 8 cm.
Round-necked T-shirt in soft jersey.

Push-up bra in lace with underwired, moulded, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps that cross at the back where they have a wide lace trim, and a narrow hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Cargo joggers in a cotton weave with an elasticated drawstring waist, fake fly, side pockets, flap back and leg pockets with press-studs and cuffed hems.

Joggers in washed, stretch denim. Regular waist with covered elastication and a drawstring, a fake fly, side pockets, and welt back pockets. Slim legs with gathered seams and a visible zip at the hems.
Baby Exclusive. Leggings in soft organic cotton jersey with an elasticated waist and fake fly with decorative buttons.
Jumper in fine-knit merino wool with a V-neck and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
5-pocket jeans in washed denim with hard-worn details in a loose fit with a high waist. Low crotch, zip fly with a button and straight legs with raw-edge hems.
Soft jersey vest top in a relaxed fit with a rib trim around the neckline and deep armholes with raw edges, and short slits in the sides.
Short, fitted jersey top with narrow shoulder straps.
Jumpers in soft, fine-knit cotton with a decorative bow at the top, buttons on one shoulder, long sleeves and roll edges around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Top in sweatshirt fabric with a motif, a double-layered drawstring hood, kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.

Ankle boots in imitation leather with open heels and toes, an adjustable ankle strap with a metal buckle and covered block heels. Imitation leather linings and insoles and chunky thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles. Heel 11 cm.
All-in-one pyjamas in soft organic cotton jersey with long sleeves, press-studs down the front and along one leg, and ribbing at the cuffs and hems.
Long-sleeved top in soft, cotton sweatshirt fabric with a washed look and print motif. Twisted side seams ending in a zip at the hem and raw roll edges around the neckline and cuffs.
Short-sleeved nursing top in soft viscose jersey with a double-layered, wrapover front for easier nursing access.
Blouse woven in an airy cotton blend with broderie anglaise, a V-neck and buttons down the front. Short puff sleeves with elasticated frill trims, and a seam with a flounce at the hem. Unlined.
Cycling shorts in fast-drying functional fabric with wide elastication at the top. Regular waist.

Sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with a high waist and wide waistband to hold in and shape the waist. Sculpting seams at the back that showcase the body’s physique. Key pocket in the waistband.
Wide top in sweatshirt fabric with dropped shoulders and long sleeves with embroidered terry appliqués. Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Tunic in a viscose weave with a small stand-up collar, button placket and gathered yoke. Long balloon sleeves with buttoned cuffs, a detachable tie belt at the waist, and a rounded hem.
Shorts in soft cotton jersey with a print motif, elasticated drawstring waist and fake diagonal front pockets.
Hooded top in light sweatshirt fabric with low dropped shoulders, a kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
5-pocket slim-fit jeans in supersoft, stretch denim with an adjustable elasticated waist, zip fly and button, and narrow hems.
Short skirt in a stretch weave with a gathered flounce at the front and concealed zip at the back. Unlined.
Sleeveless dress in patterned cotton jersey with a gathered seam at the waist and flared skirt.
Knitted pixie hat with a pompom on top and jersey lining.
Short, fitted skirt in a stretch weave with a decorative metal chain at one side, sewn-in wrapover at the front and concealed zip and button at the back. Recycled polyester lining.
Short skirt in cotton twill with a zip fly, button at the waist, front pockets and flap patch pockets at the sides. Unlined.
T-shirt in slub cotton jersey with sewn-in turn-ups at the sleeves. Rounded and slightly longer at the back.
Briefs in printed cotton jersey with a lined gusset.
Boxer shorts in soft cotton jersey with short legs, an elasticated waist and lined front.
Top in sweatshirt fabric with terry appliqués, long raglan sleeves and ribbing at the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
T-shirt in soft, printed cotton jersey with slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Pyjamas in soft, cotton jersey. Long-sleeved top with ribbing around the neckline and cuffs. Bottoms with an elasticated waist and ribbed hems.
Calf-length, pleated skirt in an airy weave with a high waist with covered elastication. Jersey underskirt.
Short T-shirt dress in sturdy cotton jersey with ribbing around the neckline and a text print on the chest. Dropped shoulders, short sleeves and pockets in the side seams.
Trunks in stretch organic cotton jersey with flatlock seams, an elasticated waist, lined front and mid-length legs.
Baby Exclusive Dungarees in soft, fine-knit organic cotton. Flounce-trimmed straps with an adjustable fastening at the back, and ribbed hems.
Jacket in a sturdy textured weave with glittery threads and contrasting colour details. Round neck, metal buttons down the front and front pockets with a decorative button. Lined.
Slim-fit trousers in soft, stretch twill with a brushed finish. Zip fly and button, fake front pockets, real back pockets and straight hems.
Hat in a soft rib knit with a sewn-in turn-up at the hem.
Scarf in a soft weave with fringes on the short sides. Size approx. 45x225 cm.
Short, 5-pocket, high-waisted shorts in washed denim with worn details, a button fly and sewn-in, raw-edge turn-ups at the hems.
Scarf in a soft weave with fringes on the short sides.
Long-sleeved jumper in soft, rib-knit linen with a round neckline in a relaxed fit.
Cardigan in a soft bouclé knit made from a wool blend with a hood and no buttons.

Sports top in sturdy jersey with a stand-up collar and mesh-lined hood with an elastic drawstring. Zip down the front, pleated sections on the sleeves, shoulders and chest and zipped side pockets. Ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Calf-length, pleated skirt in airy crêpe with a high waist, side fastening and wrapover front. Unlined.
Long-sleeved cardigan in sequin-embroidered tulle with a V-neck and concealed button at the front. Lined in woven fabric.
Balconette lace bra with underwired, moulded, lightly padded cups that lift and shape. Narrow, adjustable, detachable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Blouse in a patterned viscose weave with a V-neck, buttons down the front, short, wide sleeves and a tie detail at the hem. Unlined.
Baby Exclusive. Cardigan in a soft wool blend with a hood, buttons down the front and trimmed edges. Jersey lining.

Calf-length trenchcoat in a sturdy weave made from a cotton blend with a collar, buttons down the front with decorative buttons alongside, and a concealed inner button. Long raglan sleeves with a wide, tapered tab and button at the cuffs. Wide welt side pockets, belt loops at the back and an adjustable belt with a covered metal buckle. High slits in the sides and a pleat at the back with a concealed tab and button to adjust the opening of the pleat. Lined at the top.
Thong briefs in lace with a low waist and lined gusset.
Boxer briefs in soft, printed cotton jersey with an elasticated waist and lined gusset.
Jacket in washed denim with embroidery, a collar, buttons down the front, flap chest pockets with a button and side pockets. Buttons at the cuffs and tabs and buttons at the hem.
Jacket in a patterned crêpe weave with wide 3/4-length sleeves. No fasteners.
Henley top in jersey with a button placket and long sleeves with a tab and button.
Vest top in jersey crêpe with scalloped edges.
Lined, triangular scarves in soft cotton jersey with an adjustable press-stud fastening at the back of the neck.
